name: House of Bdellynx 2023
description:
This is House of Bdellynx 2023. You are Barber Baron. Protect the Tribal Secrets of Antarctica so that we can release the Sevenfold Doctrine later on. Your mission is to take back our treasures from the thieves. 

December 2023 = 3900 shekels.

Created by Larry Tavtekka.

Movement = arrow keys

Jump = Up arrow

Barber Baron's Sword of Eternal Topaz = Space Bar
